title: What goes into the launch of a new irrigation product? - Landscape Management magazine
summary: Irrigation companies like Rain Bird and Hunter Industries invest heavily in research and development to create innovative products that meet the needs of contractors. They gather feedback from customers through surveys, interviews, and field testing to ensure their products are reliable and meet industry standards. The companies also prioritize the development of water-efficient products to address concerns about water conservation and sustainability.
official_company_name: Rain Bird Corporation and Hunter Industries Inc.
product_or_process: water-efficient sprinklers, smart irrigation controllers, web-connected irrigation controllers

greenwashing: The article does not suggest any evidence of greenwashing, as the companies explicitly prioritize water efficiency and sustainability in their product development.

title: Bang & Olufsen Introduces Beosound A5 Portable Speaker - eCoustics
summary: Bang & Olufsen has launched the Beosound A5, a portable speaker designed in collaboration with GamFratesi. This speaker features a Scandinavian design aesthetic, powerful sound, and a focus on longevity through modular design and software updates. Beosound A5 is designed to be both portable and home-friendly, with features like a wireless charger and IP65 water and dustproof rating.
